title: (8500-722) Portimão - 508 Rua dos Jesuítas
description: Large square in the middle of a housing estate, very close to the old town. No supply disposal. No height restriction. Outside there are also spaces for parallel parking. We only used this space as a daytime parking space.

title: (8500) Portimão - 5 Praça da República
description: Big gravel place. Have stood here during the day for nothing.

title: (8500-691) Portimão - LB Rua Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (8500-691) Portimão - LB Rua Infante Dom Henrique

title_short: (8501-858) Portimão - Rua D. Carlos I 18 A 20

title: (8500-643) Portimão - 9 Avenida Miguel Bombarda
description: Public parking, day and night. You can spend the night and all the squares are under trees. Not for vehicles over six meters. Next to multiple sports facilities and the soccer field. And just over 5 minutes from the historic center of Portimão.

title: (8500) Portimão - Rua do Campo de Futebol

title: (8500-343) Portimão - Parque de Feiras e Exposições de Portimão
title_short: (8500-343) Portimão - Parque de Feiras e Exposições de Portimão

address.street: Parque de Feiras e Exposições de Portimão

title: (8500-690) Portimão - 22 Rua da Barca
description: It’s a ‘normal’, asphaltic parking space directly at the waterfront, for free and quiet (just the sound of the cars on the bridge but completely moderate). The view was great and within 1 minute walk, you’re straight at the main waterfront promenade. Motor homes and camper vans are allowed to enter and no one cared about us sleeping in our motor home.

title: (8500) Portimão - 26 Rua de São José
description: Totally flat and very quiet parking, good views. Overnight allowed, the GNR passed by and didn't tell us anything. We spent the night here with 3 other motorhomes in complete peace of mind. In the morning people doing sports and walking their dogs 1 minute walk from the river pass with bike lane, perfect for visiting the city.

title: (8500-580) Portimão - BP Rua Sidónio Pais
description: GPL point, easy to access.

title: (8500-510) Portimão - BP Rua Sidónio Pais
description:
Laundry. It's on the parking of lidl. Prices: 
Detergent is included. Smell and dryness are perfect

name: Lidl Portimão

description: Lidl car park in Portimão with special parking spaces for mobile homes, toilets and textile washing machines.

title: (8500-503) Portimão - R. Gonçalo Nascimento
description: Car park next to the port, without any signs that prohibit motorhome parking. Boat trips to the Benagil caves depart from here. Quiet area at night, but very busy during the day.

24h. It is in front of Lidl

title: (8500) Portimão - Estrada do Bom Retiro
description: Large free car park next to the bus station and arena. Stayed overnight no problem. Normal city noise but fairly quiet. Car park got busy on the Sunday morning due to market at arena. No services but toilets in bus station.

title: (8500) Portimão - Rua da Abicada
description: Repsol station lpg, when you enter the boulevard coming from silves, do not go under the tunnel, take the ramp on the right, repsol is on the left, and make the complete turn to return to the station, pump right.

title: (8500) Portimão - Unnamed Road

title: (8500-512) Portimão - 4-22 Estrada da Rocha

title: (8500-313) Portimão - 8500 Rua das Aroeiras
description: Intermarché laundromat. The most expensive we have found so far in Portugal. 1 washing machine 18kg, 1 washing machine 8kg and 1 dryer 18kg.

title: (8500-367) Portimão - 5 Rua Vista Mar

title: (8400) Parchal - 10 Rua Miguel Torga
description: We could spend a couple of nights here, without disturbance of anyone. Great view to Portimao and Ferragudo is also in walking distance. For a service, visit the train station in Ferragudo!

title: (8500-807) Portimão - 4 Rua C
description: Parking along the way. Busy road. But next to the beach. Free parking.

title: (8500-510) Portimão - 1 Rua da Falésia

description: Free and large parking 10min from the beach. There are a few people, it is better to arrive early.

title: (8500-802) Portimão - 92 Avenida Tomás Cabreira

title: (8500) Portimão - Rua da Falésia

title: (8500) Portimão - R. da Falésia

description: Parking next to the water, 3km from the slide and splash water park. horizontal, free, glued to games for children and for the maintenance of adults. public toilets. nice view. water.

title: (8400) Ferragudo - 10A Urbanização Ferragudo Valley
description: On street parking on a dead end street. The motorhome stays within the lines.

title: (8400) Ferragudo - 8 Urbanização da Grandlinha

title: (8400) Ferragudo - Rua Doutor Coelho de Carvalho
title_short: (8400) Ferragudo - Rua Doutor Coelho de Carvalho
description: Beach shower accessible for all. Cold water but more than enough to shower in the summer season.

title: (8500) Portimão - Urbanização Vau da Rocha

title: (8400-147) Estômbar - 5 R. Patrício Júdice

title: (8500-783) Alvor - 25 Urbanização Mar e Serra
description: Park parking for 6 motorhomes. Self service laundry. €8 - 19kg, €4 - 8kg, €2 per drying cycle. Cheapest fuel in the region.

title: (8500-059) Alvor - EM531-1
description: It is a fairly flat unpaved parking lot, we spent one night and it was very quiet, we were with two more motorhomes.

title: (8500) Alvor - Caminho da Praia do João d'Arens
title_short: (8500) Alvor - Caminho da Praia do João d'Arens
description: Small parking lot, not particularly pleasant, quite a bit of rubbish in the bushes & forest, but very quiet. About a 5-10 minute walk down a narrow path to a beautiful mini bay. It was worth it, the only visitors were there in the morning and in the evening. No Services.

address.street: Caminho da Praia do João d'Arens

title: (8500) Alvor - 39 N125
description: Free water BP gas station

title: (8400) Ferragudo - 49 Rua de Vale da Azenhaga
title_short: (8400) Ferragudo - 49 Rua de Vale da Azenhaga
description: This place is a private parking lot, available to campers, it use to be a restaurant but now is closed. There is a private gate that is normally closed. You should book the place in advance. There is space for 6 large or 8 small campers. 15 minute walk to the beach, cliff top hiking and 20 minute walk to the main fishing village and 10 minute walk to one of the best sunset spots in the Algarve, at the cliff top lighthouse. The place is fenced and secured. It is compacted gravel. No height limit. No length limit. Mário and Vanda have been the owners for more than 42years. Enjoy your stay.

title: (8500) Alvor -
description: Parking on the street, walking distance to the beach. It is forbidden to park mobile homes in the parking lots on the beach, so the places on the roadside are a good alternative. Spent the night without any problems. No toilets or anything like that.

name: Camping Alvor
title: (8500) Camping Alvor
description: Campsite Alvor: a guarded campsite with friendly staff. There is a swimming pool, 5 small outhouses so there is always one nearby. The amazing Praia dos tres irmaos is only 7 minutes away by car.

title: (8500-013) Alvor - 8500 Rua Quinta da Praia
description: Road shoulder in front of the back for a few blocks, nothing special but not too much traffic (although you can hear a commotion in the morning) and no no parking sign. We went by motorhome, option in case you don't find anything better or everything is busy, you can sleep without problem and there are bars nearby.

title: (8500-087) Alvor - 29 Rua Serpa Pinto
description: Large parking spaces, valid for motorhomes and vans.   Comfortable to go to the beach, 10 minutes walk. No services.

title: (8500-013) Alvor - A Estrada da Barca
description: Automatic laundry in a building course open 7/7 from 9h to 20h in the winter and 22h in the summer machine 9kg 4euros 12kg 6 euros 15kg 8euros detergent included dryer 16kg 1.5euros the 15mins wifi free socket outlet distributor money machine to make money

title: (8500) Alvor - Caminho Maria Pires
description: Small car park with 4/5 places. Very pleasant and quiet place with nice view. This place is Natura 2000 land so overnight stays are prohibited.

title: (8500-016) Alvor - 23 Rua Doutor Afonso Costa
description: Small shop (drogaria) which sells gas (campingaz bottles) and DIY materials of all kinds. Following a gas outage in the area, she helped us out a lot!

title: (8500) Alvor - Rua da Nau
description: In the "SEADECK" beach bar there are public toilets, and it is not necessary to consume anything in the bar. The toilets operate on the same hours as the Seadeck restaurant. The restaurant is open from April to October.

title: (8500-088) Portimão - 1 Praceta do Barinel
description:
Quiet and safe place
 Beachfront, nice to wake up and go for a swim. 5 minute walk to town.

title: (8500) Alvor - Av. Eng. Nuno Mergulhão
description: Roadside parking that's used for the beach, anything west of this (to Alvor) is classed as Natura 2000 land. Relatively level, road is busy throughout the day but quieter at night. Not idyllic by any means, but close to the beach and no restrictions as of now. Away from residential.

title: (8400) Estômbar -
description: Nothing special. A couple of small clearings in the bushes just off the road. The first clearing can be seen from the road but go in slightly further and you have privacy. Some dumped rubbish like broken tiles. A few spikes and stones on the ground. The road can be heard but it is not too busy.

name: CampingCar Figueira
title: (8500-132) CampingCar Figueira
description:
CampingCar Figueira is a great place for families.
It has all the necessary services.
It is a cared for, clean and safe space.
It has water, flushing and electricity available on the plots.

title: (8400) Carvoeiro -

title: (8400) Lagoa - Q.ta da Bemposta

title: (8400) Lagoa - Unnamed Road

description: Oasis Camp: dreamy natural swimming lake in a central location in the Algarve with panoramic views over the Portimao skyline. Fitness room and yoga dome available. Hot showers. Breakfast and dinner can be booked on request. Surfing can also be booked at any time.

title: (8400) Carvoeiro - 31 Rua João Paulo II

title: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama
title_short: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama
description: Parking space right at the lagoon, which is a kiting spot (look at the tides). You can also walk over to the beach at the open ocean. There's a kite and surf school and shop that also offers fresh oysters! They may also have wifi in high season. Please keep the spot clean! Downside is the railway track, but it's not frequently used and not too loud. There may also be dogs barking or people passing by.

title: (8400) Carvoeiro - 97 Estrada do Farol
description: Public parking in the heart of Carvoeiro. Right next to the Mirachoro Praia hotel. It is attached to a futsal court and is located in a quiet area to walk around the city or go to the beach.

title: (8300) Silves -
description: Just inside the town of Falacho is a water tap with free drinking water supplies by the town. Next to the dustbin area on the other side of the lane. it's a large screw adapter but one was on the tap when we were there.

title: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama
title_short: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama

Parking inside an urbanization To see the town.
In low season ok

title: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama
title_short: (8600) Odiáxere - Estra do Vale da Lama
description: Nice little spot at the end of a dirt road. If the spots before are all taken ;). You’ll pass some soft sand, but not a real problem for vans. 5min walk from the beach. Also good for bird watching at the lagoon. Spent 3 nights here (low season) without any problems. Few people who walk their dogs were friendly. Keep the place CLEAN!

name: Camping Casa Barco à Vela
title: (8300-010) Camping Casa Barco à Vela
description: Quit place with great view, price including toilet, fresh water and waste water disposal, electrical connection 16 amp . Please make Reservation before 17.00 pm.

title: (8300-037) Silves -
description: The place is below a road with little traffic. The way there is like a forest path, easy to drive on, but only suitable for smaller vans. Next door is a river. Good for one night.

name: Vale dos Guenos | Motorhome Park
title: (8500) Vale dos Guenos | Motorhome Park
description: Vale dos Guenos with 10 000m2 is located in a rural area, in the middle of two green hills. Being a place surrounded by forest and wide green fields, it is ideal for hiking, reading a book by the lake while listening to the birds or just relaxing because there is nothing to hear besides nature. We have places with or without electricity, too we have drinking water supply.

name: Algarve Motorhome Park  Silves
title: (8300) Algarve Motorhome Park Silves
description:
Individual electric hook-up and water, grey water and toilet disposal, large individual area (60m²), showers, wc, laundry,free wifi, countryside vieuw, city center Silves, restaurants and shops nearby. Portimão 8km. Golf nearby. Open 365 days a year.
WE DON'T ACCEPT BOOKINGS, THE NUMBER OF PLACES AVAILABLE IS ALWAYS UPDATED ON OUR WEBSITE

name: Quinta Alfarrobeira
title: (8600-258) Quinta Alfarrobeira
description:
We only host campervans/bus.
Minimum stay 2 nights, 2 pers/place. No dogs.
Reachable between 10.00 and 18.00

Quinta Alfarrobeira, lokated at 1.5 km of the ocean and 1 km from the authentic village Odiáxere, is a 12 hectare estate active in rural ecotourism, small scale organic farming arts and crafts. We offer private space  for 2 campervans  on a platform overlooking the countryside, valley, orchard and vegetable garden.Shadow can be found on the spot or elsewhere on the lush planted trees in the inner gardens or elsewhere on the property. There is a bathroom a short distance away and an outdoor Finnish sauna. The spacious pool can be used with respect for the environment and other guests. When available we offer organic wine, vegetables, eggs and fruit. We value conscious people with good environmental ethics and calm social behavior.

title: (8300 038) Silves - N124
description: laundromat

title: () Silves -
description: RV park "Parque do Rio" embedded in the city park. Close to the public swimming pool and only 5 minutes walk from the city center. CLOSED for rest of summer 2023.

title: (8600-671) Lagos -
description: Near the beach with access by a wooden footbridge. We found it by chance while following the sea from Lagos. It is a large car park with a bar at the bottom overlooking the sea. The place is quiet despite a railway that must be crossed by a level crossing. The police are watching but do not say anything. Several motorhomes seem to have settled there to stay. Forbidden for Motohomes/caravans from 20h - 8h.

title: (8600) Odiáxere - N125
description: There are camping gas bottles (e.g. 907) in exchange.

title: (8300) Silves - Parque Ribeirinho de Silves
description:
Public swimming pool with sauna, turkish/ steam bath, jacuzzi
ATTENTION - as often found in Portugal it is mandatory to wear: speedos (no bermuda shorts) / swimsuit (no bikini), swim cap, flip-flops/ swimming shoes.
free WiFi.
Entry and parking for caravans and motorhomes and vehicles >3,5t prohibited on the car park (sign).

title: (8300-111) Silves - 23 Largo da República
description: To make the laundry . This is where the Silves laundry is located.

title: (8600-315) Lagos - M534

title: (8400) Carvoeiro - M1274
description: Dirt parking lot where many motorhomes go to spend the night. If you arrive late there may not be a space. A very quiet place. We spent two nights and no one from the lighthouse compound told us anything.

description: Free parking to see FIESA Sand City, an exhibition of sand sculptures. The car park is very spacious and level, it has a gate so you can't spend the night, but you can spend the day while you see the sculptures

title: (8300-148) Silves - 3 Rua do Saco
description: Parking directly at the castle and old town. For free .

title: (8600-315) Lagos - Urbanização Baía de Cristal
description: Free parking with direct access to the beach. CC prohibited from 8 p.m. to 8 a.m.

title: (8300-143) Silves - 2 Rua Diogo Manuel
description: Parking lot with trees for shade located near the castle, quite quiet and pleasant. The bakery located just next to the parking lot has good wholemeal bread.

title: (8300) Silves - Rua de Trás dos Muros
title_short: (8300) Silves - Rua de Trás dos Muros
description: Day parking only, prohibited at night from 8pm to 8am. Shaded, many places, some cars were already parked. No service but next to a supermarket and not too far from the castle and the center (15 minutes walk)

title: (8600-315) Lagos - EM534
description: Parking to spend the day with beach next door! 200 meters from the Lagos Marina with its bars and restaurants!

title: (8600-306) Odiáxere - N125
description: Daily parking only, big and always empty.

title: (8600) Odiáxere -
description: 3 washing machines and 3 dryers. Relatively cheap

title: (8600-302) Lagos - EM534
description: Street that overlooks the beach, a little busy street where you can park along the line.

title: (8400-401) Lagoa - 1a Estrada de Benagil
description: Private parking that they let spend the night. The manager is called Gonzalo and he is a very nice guy. It is a parking lot with a lot of movement during the day, but quiet at night. There is a shower for a fee and the proximity to the Benagil and Algar beaches is unbeatable. The only drawback is that the access street clearly indicates the prohibition to circulate with caravans and motorhomes, but I understand that for access to the parking lot there should be no problem, otherwise they would not let us stay overnight.

title: (8600-302) Lagos - 720 Largo da República
description: Quiet and peaceful at night, busy during the day.  Not pretty, but practical. No prohibition sign.

title: (8400) Lagoa - Unnamed Road
description: Nice parking space between the houses and nature. You can easily walk to Marinha beach from here.

title: (8400) Lagoa - Unnamed Road
description: A large place where you can park.

title: (8300) Silves - Unnamed Road
description: Great place above the ruin on a Plato. super peaceful night on the other hand be careful ⚠️ people with dogs, mine was attacked by a pit bull in the morning, the owner does not have to manage his dogs nor the situation, emergency veterinarian, watch out for your animals. ..

title: (8300-035) Quinta do Sol Poente - Silves
description:
Upon our arrival at Quinta Sol Poente, we were kindly received by Nuno and his wife Brunna. After a short off road across their property, we arrived at a beautiful spot right next to the swimming pool. The pool is the former water reservoir of their country and is refreshing for a swim on a hot day, only between October and February the pool is closed. We really like camping in nature and at this place you really get the feeling that you are standing in rugged nature. There are several corners on the property where you can relax and enjoy the view. We stayed with our camper van and slept wonderfully. In the morning we awoke by the rising sun. At the house of the family there is a dish washing area and a simple sanitary with shower facility that you can use. Do not expect luxury from a four star campsite, but experience wild camping in a beautiful surrounding. The location of this place is perfect, ancient city of Silves is only (3 minutes car) & (20 minutes walk), and is highly recommended to visit, its located inland and as you drop down into the town the skyline is dominated by the imposing castle & church on the top of the hill. The entire town is beautiful and you can take a walk through the streets to find it's architecture, the museums, the monuments scattered about. It's a must to visit the castle, after then head back down for something to eat or drink, you will find nice restaurants with terraces, just ask your hosts before you go and they will tell you about their selection. While you are there you can see dozens of storks living in the city. _____________________________________________________________
Please call or WhatsApp call/message in advance of your arrival to ensure there's place for you, and also for a welcome tour with the host. _____________________________________________________________
They have some projects going on, perhaps you want to give a help on garden maintenance tasks like; remove weeding in tree beds and planters, pruning and cutting back of hedges and small bushes, planting and maintenance of bulbs, plants or vegetables, harvesting (oranges and advocados between december & february) or help on a caravan renovation, or building a terrace for travelers. i.e - 6 hours of your time helping in exchange of 3 nights stay, let them know before if you’re interested.

title: (8400) Lagoa -
description: Room for 3 fragous, flat and quiet. 4x4 only

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Quite place right next to a dirty road. There are a few trees and small stream of water, easy access from the street. We spent a quiet night.

title: (8400) Lagoa - M1154
description: It is next to the road. As they have prohibited the access of motorhomes to Benagil this is the solution. You have to walk 20 minutes to the beach

title: (8300) Silves -
description: Zone relativement plate. Encaissée entre la falaise et de jeunes arbres... un peu d'ombre. Nuit très tranquille. Accès possible: franchissement petit fossé. 2 à 3 places. Zone plutôt propre comparée à ce que l'on constate dans la région. Merci de garder vos déchets et de ramasser ce que vous pouvez. L'utilisation de lingettes laissées dans la nature est un catastrophe pour l'environnement.  idem pour le papier toilette qui mettra 3 mois à disparaître.

title: (8300) Silves - Unnamed Road
description: At a ruin with a beautiful view. You have to cross a ford if the stream has water.

title: (8300) Silves - EM502
description: Large area very flat land below the road. Few passage at night. Nice view of the surrounding hills.

title: (8400) Lagoa - Estr. da Caramujeira
description: One of the few car parks possible to access Marinha beach and the coastal path. The local police are very strict, no motorhomes on the beaches of the coast. The other car parks are prohibited for motorhomes. No convenience but a large flat ground (sand, earth, grass) authorized day and night. 20 minutes walk from Marinha beach and Benagil beach. Kayak tour possible, coastal path, etc...

title: (8600-305) Lagos - 9 Rua Fernão Vilarinho
description: Small safe place in the beach and city (once over the bridge)

title: (8300) Silves - EM502
description: Located near Silves and a stream between the mountains

title: (8300-018) Silves -
description: Spot in the middle of nature in peace!

title: (8600-297) Lagos -
description: Small lighted car park. For 5 campers. Relatively quiet on a not too busy road. about 10 minutes walk from the port and the beach. Shops and town easily accessible is not a very busy caravan park all night

title: (8600-302) Lagos - BP Largo da República
description: Supply and disposal

title: (8600-302) Lagos - 14 N125
description: Large empty car park with no restrictions indicated, facing a body of water and the airfield.

title: (8600-318) Lagos - Estrada de São Roque
description: Parking area very close to the beach and next to the train tracks. In nearby areas they have placed signs forbidding motorhomes. Very close to the city center (cross the bridge) and very close to the beach.

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Narrow path (for vans, no RVs and high roof might also be difficult due to a tree next to the driveway) next to a road with little traffic leading to a beekeeper's hives. Beautiful sunsets and perfectly fine for one night! no service There is already too much rubbish and toilet paper in the bushes so take some with you after your visit.

title: (8600) Lagos - Rua Teixeira da Mota
description: Day parking, no parking at night from 22:00 to 8:00, marina, downtown and shops on foot, very good to visit Lagos, go for boat rides. No services.

title: (8600-302) Lagos - CP Largo da República
description:
Free parking place. Without services.
Quiet and close to the center

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Small quiet spot, away from the road! Quiet, nice sunset!

title: (8600) Lagos - Cais da Solaria
description: No parking space, only shower and toilet. Also free drinking water from tap next to shower.

title: (8400) Lagoa - 8400 Estrada de Albandeira
description: At the end of a sandy path very easy to access for any vehicle. A view of the sea in the distance and a beautiful sunset. Quiet and calm corner despite the small road next to it (little traffic). No services. The only negative point may be the barking dogs around.

title: (8600) Lagos - Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Paid parking, blue zone, on the beach, with supermarket nearby and incredible views. It is a bit slanted for sleeping. It is advisable to arrive before 8.30 to get a seat.

title: (8600-607) Lagos - 3 Praça Infante Dom Henrique
description: Water tap for filling drinking bottles and can possibly do small tanks

title: (8400) Porches - 16 EM530-1
description: Large flat and sandy scrubland shaded by many pines. Enough room for 10 vans. A few restaurants within walking distance, "A Paragem" in particular offers a very affordable menu with a good choice of tasty dishes and generous portions. The site is right on the Ecovia do Litoral, a cycle route that runs the length of the Algarve, from Tavira in the east to Sagres in the west, so it's a great choice for cyclists.

title: (8600-315) Lagos - 1 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description:
Center city, principal avenida at the side Hotel Marina Rio. 
No proibithion for autocaravan's.

title: (8600) Lagos - 18 N125
description: Supermarket Designated Motorhome Parking, overnight allowed, 1km from a Motorhome service area at the BP gas station. Water nearby

title: (8600-722) Lagos - 80 Largo do Rossio de São João Batista
title_short: (8600-722) Lagos - 80 Largo do Rossio de São João Batista
description: Parking all day. They are small places but in some you can put a motorhome

address.street: 80 Largo do Rossio de São João Batista

title: (8600-302) Lagos - ES Rua Cidade de Torres Vedras
title_short: (8600-302) Lagos - ES Rua Cidade de Torres Vedras
description: Parking for a maximum of 3 hours. In winter you only have to pay during the week from 09:00 to 19:00. In front of the port and very close to the center. You can park any type of camper van in the spaces that overlook the port. These slot machines ate a lot of time.

address.street: ES Rua Cidade de Torres Vedras

title: (8600) Lagos -
description: This warm-hearted community offers their land for overnight stays. There aren't that many shaded areas, but there is a pool, a beautiful forest and several showers. For a surcharge you can also eat there and great events take place regularly. Dogs are only allowed in the area where the vans/caravans are parked. The price of 10€ is for a small van including one person. A large caravan costs €12 and each additional person €5 extra. Children from 3 years only 2€ extra.

title: (8600-722) Lagos - 71A Rua Dom Vasco da Gama
title_short: (8600-722) Lagos - 71A Rua Dom Vasco da Gama
description: Laundromat / Laundry self service

title: (8600-749) Lagos - 14 Rua Cidade de Torres Vedras
title_short: (8600-749) Lagos - 14 Rua Cidade de Torres Vedras
description: Mermaid Laundry, cash only, coin machine inside.

title: (8600-744) Lagos - Rua Cidade Torres Vedras
description: It is a street with free parking where there is no problem spending the night as long as you don't take anything out onto the street.

title: (8600) Lagos - Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
description: Parking is located on old football field located next to the camping Trindade. During the day, there is a security guard that find you a parking lot and watches the vehicle. Nearby Beach Pinhão, Santa Ana and students. It is also close to the promenade and old town.

title: (8500) Portimão - Estr. Luis Carreira
description: Parking of the circuit, a lot of space, quiet and without problems to spend the night. The squares below are fairly level. Great for watching races

title: (8600-722) Lagos - 20 Rua da Barreira
description: Parking in the center, we do not know if it is paying but we had no problems.

name: Camping Trindade
title: (8600-315) Camping Trindade
description: The campsite is well located for going to the beach and visiting the town. The subsoil is compacted earth. Little sun, mostly under trees. The staff does NOT speak any foreign languages. Reservations not possible. Electricity available at central points. Not suitable for vehicles longer than 9 m.

title: (8600-642) Lagos - 2 Estrada da Ponta da Piedade
title_short: (8600-642) Lagos - 2 Estrada da Ponta da Piedade
description: Washing facilities at the Spar supermarket. 8kg laundry, 13kg laundry, 13kg dryer for 30 minutes, 8kg dryer for 20 minutes

title: (8600-315) Lagos - Alameda Doutor Armando Soares Ribeiro
title_short: (8600-315) Lagos - Alameda Doutor Armando Soares Ribeiro
description: Free parking, slope upstairs, downstairs, wc pay, ideal for the beach very beautiful

title: (8600-302) Lagos - R. dos Celeiros
description: Hardware store that has Campinggaz bottles. Friendly staff.

title: (8600-671) Lagos - 13 Rua Ilha Graciosa
description: Large parking for visiting Lagos, on land no services

title: (8600-662) Lagos - 1 Rua do Jogo da Bola
title_short: (8600-662) Lagos - 1 Rua do Jogo da Bola
description: At the end of a parking lot, under the ramparts. Not tarred. No service, but very quiet and 5 minutes from the center. To access it you have to cross the car park. Depending on the occupation of the latter access may be difficult for vehicles longer than 6.5 m.

title: (8600-302) Lagos - 24 Rua Belchior Moreira de Barbudo
title_short: (8600-302) Lagos - 24 Rua Belchior Moreira de Barbudo
description: Land parking very close to the port, restaurants and downtown area, there is a sign that indicates a parking prohibition from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m. Great for visiting the center of Lagos

title: (8600) Lagos - Rua Cidade da Ribeira Grande
title_short: (8600) Lagos - Rua Cidade da Ribeira Grande
description: Area of free parking. A bit busy during the day but very quiet at night and the weekends. Very close to the centre and there is a supermarket very close to it.

title: (8600) Lagos - 14 Rua da Ilha da Madeira
title_short: (8600) Lagos - 14 Rua da Ilha da Madeira
description: 2 small quiet squares next to the big free sandy parking

title: (8600-545) Lagos - 4 Beco da Dona Marta
description: It is free parking. We stayed two nights and everything was perfect. Close to the city center, bars, shops ... With the shadows of the trees and the light of the night.

title: (8600-302) Lagos - 12b Rua Dom Vasco da Gama
title_short: (8600-302) Lagos - 12b Rua Dom Vasco da Gama
description: Bottled gas shop with Campinggaz bottles.

name: Casa Zambeek
title: (8300-041) Casa Zambeek
description: Casa Zambeek is a unique place. you can relax here, unwind and enjoy nature, just 3 minutes away from the town of Silves. googlemaps is reporting the last kilometer incorrectly. don't go on the dirt road, keep driving on the asphalt. see attached photos. On the spot you have access to toilet, shower and sink to do your dishes. very good internet. Directly behind our house, there is a large nature reserve. The hiking route of the ViaAlgravia. So close to everything and yet far enough away from the crowds. We look forward to seeing you. See you soon. Han and Emma

title: (8600-512) Lagos - 44 Rua Professor Luis de Albuquerque
title_short: (8600-512) Lagos - 44 Rua Professor Luis de Albuquerque
description: A very very small parking lot, only able to park 3 cars.  There is no prohibition sign and there is a motorcycle sound at night.

title: (8600-545) Lagos - 11C Rua da Gafaria
description: Parking near the ramparts, ideal for visiting the old town. Sloping parking. No prohibition sign and easily accessible.

title: (8400) Porches - 338a N125
description:
Private property, completely closed. Really quiet place, 5 min walk from Porches. Electricity and water available.
We rent surf board and bycicle.
Dogs or other animals accepted.

title: (8600) Odiáxere -
description: Big parking area for the motorway right next to it. Not real sure if it's allowed, at least nobody complained about our van. Noicy motorsounds occur tough, depending on shedule of the motorway.

title: (8600-544) Lagos - Estrada da Ponta da Piedade
title_short: (8600-544) Lagos - Estrada da Ponta da Piedade
description: The best free place for Ponte da Piedale. The road towards the Lighthouse, is under contruction, here is a very large temporary free parking for everyone. Camping is not allowed, come here in the morning but after 9:00 and departure before 21:00, do not open awnings, or any other camping behavior, just park tidy. In high season even parking may be restricted.

title: (8600-315) Lagos - 2G Rua José Ventura Neto Cabrita
title_short: (8600-315) Lagos - 2G Rua José Ventura Neto Cabrita
description: Clean and nice laundromat with free wifi

title: (8600-541) Lagos - b23 Rua do Compromisso Marítimo
title_short: (8600-541) Lagos - b23 Rua do Compromisso Marítimo
description: public toilets

title: (8600-621) Lagos - 18 Rua Santa Casa da Misericórdia de Lagos
title_short: (8600-621) Lagos - 18 Rua Santa Casa da Misericórdia de Lagos
description: Small plot. we spent the night alone without problems restaurants and beach Dña Ana and students nearby.

address.street: 18 Rua Santa Casa da Misericórdia de Lagos

title: (8600-775) Lagos - 35 Rua Francisco Xavier Ataíde de Oliveira
title_short: (8600-775) Lagos - 35 Rua Francisco Xavier Ataíde de Oliveira
description: Small car park across the road from Lidl. I stayed here 2 nights, alone on 1st night and with 3 others on 2nd. No facilities but felt very safe. Town less than a 10 minute walk and beach 15 mins. away. I would stay again.

address.street: 35 Rua Francisco Xavier Ataíde de Oliveira

title: (8600-302) Lagos - 116 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description: Two designated parking spaces in the Lidl car park. We stayed here for one night, the noise level was ok. Absolutely sufficient for one night.

title: (8600-530) Lagos - 17 Avenida das Comunidades Portuguesas
description: Good place to park, without getting into the center (AC prohibition signs and resident only area) and with shade. Ideal to visit the Ponta da Piedade area and its wonderful coves (30 'walk).

title: (8600-644) Lagos - Av. do Cabo Bojador
description: Washing machine and dryer. Perfect free wifi while waiting for the machine to finish! There is a parking lot next door to park easily even with a CC.

title: (8400) Porches - Unnamed Road
description: Several spots in the middle of the guarrigue. quiet, clean, about 700 meters from the first beach. place to preserve. No trash lying around. So for the happiness of all, leave it in the state that you found it. Narrow entrance: for a van ok.

title: (8600-570) Lagos - M-10 Rua Dom António de Almeida
title_short: (8600-570) Lagos - M-10 Rua Dom António de Almeida
description: You can park your motorhome. It is a space with only 3 seats in albero. There is no prohibited signage anywhere. It is on a somewhat elevated and sloping plain.

address.street: M-10 Rua Dom António de Almeida

title: (8600) Lagos - M536
description: New day parking. Free of charge. From here you can walk to the adjacent beaches and bays. Very nice area. It is worth exploring the area. No height limit.

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Emplacement pour se garer en campingcar.

title: (8400) Lagoa -
description: Easy off-road road, bathing beach nearby, which is hardly visited

title: (8400) Porches - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of the Portuguese scrubland, a large rather flat platform We landed there for a calm and cool night. At the base we were only passing to go to the spot at the edge of the water but there you have it, an impassable obstacle in Van (MP) and not the liver to go around so we stayed there. I put a photo of the obstacle, if you want the other spot do not follow the GPS and do not go through it, unless you are in a 4x4.

title: (8400) Porches -
description: A quiet spot in the countryside, a good backup spot given most of the roads to the coast are closed for camper vans.

title: (8600-573) Lagos - 38 Rua Dom João Xavier
description:
Small parking by the road. 
No signs about time restriction

title: (8400) Porches - Rua Vale de Engenho
description: Arenal quiet in what seems like a motorcycle circuit, at a distance from humanity

name: Casa da Pega
title: (8300) Casa da Pega
description: 4 Beautiful places available in a fenced area with Dutch owners. Quiet and rural setting with a large garden. Close to Silves 5 km and the Quinta bar within walking distance 1 km where you can go for a snack and a drink (live music on weekends) we have a cozy outdoor kitchen, fully equipped! Fruit and vegetables are sold at the door every Wednesday afternoon. Daily bread service. Price is based on 2 persons, each additional person is 1,50€.

title: (8600-666) Lagos - 6 Praça da Paz
description:
Parking that is not pretty, but it is ample and not far from the center (closer they were full). 12 min walk to the marina, historic city...
In August there was plenty of room and the night was quiet.

title: (8600-599) Lagos - B 1 Rua Joaquim Victor Correia Valarinho
title_short: (8600-599) Lagos - B 1 Rua Joaquim Victor Correia Valarinho
description: Nice parking lot under palm trees at adjacent residential buildings. No prohibition signs. Close to the center, very nice to explore Lagos. Overnight in a camper is no problem.

address.street: B 1 Rua Joaquim Victor Correia Valarinho

title: (8600-284) Lagos - 183 Rua Doutor José Joaquim Figueiredo Luis
title_short: (8600-284) Lagos - 183 Rua Doutor José Joaquim Figueiredo Luis
description: Parking lot on a sparsely built-up road. beautiful view

address.street: 183 Rua Doutor José Joaquim Figueiredo Luis

title: (8600) Odiáxere -
description: Caravan parking during events at the Algarve circuit. At the Kartodromo. There you can use the toilets. With luck you get a power connection.

title: (8600-365) Lagos - 39 Rua Dona Maria Judice Biker Canhete
title_short: (8600-365) Lagos - 39 Rua Dona Maria Judice Biker Canhete
description: Residential and completely flat neighborhood, in other places I have seen many motorhomes, this is a bit sheltered and it is very quiet. You are simply parked on the street. Very close to punta piedade.

address.street: 39 Rua Dona Maria Judice Biker Canhete

title: (8600-710) Lagos - 316 Rua do Parque Residencial Cerro das Mós
title_short: (8600-710) Lagos - 316 Rua do Parque Residencial Cerro das Mós
description: ALDI supermarket parking lot, overnight allowed. Fresh bakery in the morning, supermarket opens at 8am.

address.street: 316 Rua do Parque Residencial Cerro das Mós

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Here you stand very nicely on a hill and see the sea in one direction and a beautiful green valley in the other. The nearest beach is not very far away and can be reached on foot.

title: (8600) Odiáxere - R. Nunes Lisa
description: Good place to watch go karting, no problem for over night.

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Wild abandoned place. Total off-road but if you drive carefully you can reach it with big camper-van like we did. Quiet at night no one passing by only dogs barking at night. Close to nice beach and basically no one interested in you . Also nice the to the ocean

title: (8600-543) Lagos - R. Dom Gaspar Leão
description: Large parking. Quiet and secure for the night. 100mts from ALDI. 1km from the center.

title: (8400) Porches -
description: Beach dirt parking. It's not level at all but you can investigate the paths to find something decent.
